The naturally occurring Redstone can transfer simple signals. By the integration of Redstone dust in the aluminum frame of the pipes, I created a pipe that also transfers Redstone signals.
Furthermore the new pipes have no loss of signal strength and can be simply connected to traditional Redstone dust.
This pipes are especially handy to provide machines and lights with Redstone signals.

Configuration: Using the Scrench I'm able to configure every side of a pipe segment, so I can prevent them from connecting with this side. (§lright click§r on desired side). Furthermore these pipes have a third state, marked by a red dot on the side. In this state it's only connected for Redstone signals, but not for Items.
